column1: The Purple Pig////If you like pork and meat
column2: then this restaurant is the place for you. Everything we tried was delicious and flavorful but it does verge on being too salty at certain bites. I wouldn't wait two hours for here but I would come back again at around the same time at night when the wait is way shorter and it is less crowded. I imagine that the wait is this long probably because people are spending a whole hour to finish up their bottle of wine.
